name: Alchemy Tales (Stalgbit)
description:
Become an alchemist!

Having finished your apprenticeship in alchemy, you decide to open your own independent apothecary. With townspeople in need of everyday supplements, and adventurers in need of support items, you're sure your potions can come in handy for everyone.

Features

  • Go out and gather ingredients for your potions
  • Brew a variety of potions from your workshop
  • Open your store to sell the potions you brewed

Planned

  • Brew Unique Specialized Potions using a step by step process
  • Help out unique customers with their own story lines
  • Use the money you earned to directly buy ingredients and workshop upgrades
  • Use the power of transmutation to recycle materials
